Room.Name: Beginning of the Long Sands
Room.Description: Massive cactus', sparsley covered in bright pink flowers, stand sentinel over the Long Sands. Their thorns, as long and thick as a human fingers, cast eerie shadows across the pure white expanse, which stretches for miles as far as the eyes can see. A few tumbleweeds skitter about, bringing a little bit of movement to an otherwise unmoving backdrop.

Room.Name: The Long Sands
Room.Description: Pure white sands stretch out as far as the eyes can see, glittering blindingly in both sunlight and moonlight. Barely discernable, an occasional lizard or snake can be seen hiding in the shade of the many cactus standing lookout over the desert. A few large, pink flowers, in various states of bloom, against the green backdrop of the cactus', are the only color to be seen.

Room.Name: The Long Sands
Room.Description: Glittering brightly in any light, the desert stretches out in every direction like a brilliant diamond. Deep, intricate patterns are cut into the powdery foundation, shifting each time a wind storm blows through. In several places, the sands are piled high against large, green cactus', which stand in brilliant contrast to the milky landscape.

Room.Name: The Long Sands
Room.Description: Massive cactus', sparsley covered in bright pink flowers, stand sentinel over the Long Sands. Their thorns, as long and thick as human fingers, cast eerie shadows across the pure white expanse, which stretches for miles in every direction. Barely discernable, an occasional lizard or snake can be seen hiding in the shade of the many cactus standing lookout over the desert. A few large, pink flowers, in various states of bloom, against the green backdrop of the cactus', are the only color to be seen.

Room.Name: Entrance to Rivenrock Canyon
Room.Description: Twin spires, carved long ago from the river that used to flow through the Long Sands, stand sentry before the entrance to Rivenrock Canyon. Reaching all the way to the clouds, rings of color, from dull to bright, trace their way up to the pinnacles of these awe inspiring monuments of a long gone waters.

Room.Name: A Narrow Passageway
Room.Description: No more than one horse and rider wide at its broadest point, this tiny passageway feels like it is closing in on you. With a shiver of trepidition, you hope the occupants of the canyon are friendly, as escape will be very difficult.

Room.Name: A Narrow Passageway
Room.Description: No more than one horse and rider wide at its broadest point, this tiny passageway feels like it is closing in on you. With a shiver of trepidition, you hope the occupants of the canyon are friendly, as escape will be very difficult.

Room.Name: Rivenrock Canyon
Room.Description: If not for the sheer size of the canyon, you would easily feel overwhelmed and a bit dizzy by the walls towering above you, closing you in on all sides but for a mere passageway, barely one horse wide, leading out to the Long Sands. The walls themselves are dotted with substantial sized caves, only accessible by way of the tiny pathways crisscrossing the walls at convulted angles. Whoever carved them out long ago should have planned it more carefully.

Room.Name: Rivenrock Canyon
Room.Description: Massive stone walls loom above you on all sides, making you feel a bit dizzy. Small rocks crumble down the sides from gaping caverns dotting the cliff's face. Small pathways can be seen crisscrossing the walls, sometimes curving back upon themselves. A tiny passageway is the only means of escape from the canyon, and looking at the size of the caverns, you begins to wonder if leaving while you still can wouldn't be a bad idea.

Room.Name: Rivenrock Canyon
Room.Description: Small rocks litter the ground, eroded away from the cliff walls towering high above the canyon, crunching softly beneath your feet. You glance around and see dozens of pathways, barely discernable to the eye, crisscrossing the cliffs. The pathways, obviously man-made, lead to the caverns that abound throughout the canyon. Although they appear small from this great distance, they are obviously massive in size to easily accomadate their over large inhabitants.

Room.Name: Rivenrock Canyon
Room.Description: If not for the sheer size of the canyon, you would easily feel overwhelmed and a bit dizzy by the walls towering above you, closing you in on all sides but for a mere passageway, barely one horse wide, leading out to the Long Sands. The walls themselves are dotted with substantial sized caves, only accessible by way of the tiny pathways crisscrossing the walls at convulted angles. Although they appear small from this great distance, they are obviously massive in size to easily accomadate their over large inhabitants.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Loose stones shift precariously beneath your feet, causing you to struggle to retain your balance. At times, the ledge is so narrow you find yourself crawling on your hands and knees just to avoid falling down the sheer, cliff wall to the rock strewn desert below.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Debris from the eroding canyon makes traversing the narrow pathways zig-zagging the cliff walls difficult at the best of times and almost impossible where the paths have nearly crumbled away. Slipping and sliding as you make your way around, you desperately look for handholds to help you retain your balance.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Loose stones shift precariously beneath your feet, causing you to struggle to retain your balance. At times, the ledge is so narrow you find yourself crawling on your hands and knees just to avoid falling down the sheer, cliff wall to the rock strewn desert below.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Loose stones shift precariously beneath your feet, causing you to struggle to retain your balance. At times, the ledge is so narrow you find yourself crawling on your hands and knees just to avoid falling down the sheer, cliff wall to the rock strewn desert below.

Room.Name: Entrance to a Large Cavern
Room.Description: Built up and torn down again over and over by hatchling dragon fire, the cavernous space is large enough to comfortably hold a female dragon ready to lay her eggs. Large boulders, blackened from the fires, are strewn across the pathway, partially blocking the entrance to the cave, which reverbrates with each little sound. With a sense of trepedition, you wonder if the occupants are currently in residence.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Debris from the eroding canyon makes traversing the narrow pathways zig-zagging the cliff walls difficult at the best of times and almost impossible where the paths have nearly crumbled away. Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Loose stones shift precariously beneath your feet, causing you to struggle to retain your balance. At times, the ledge is so narrow you find yourself crawling on your hands and knees just to avoid falling down the sheer, cliff wall to the rock strewn desert below.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Debris from the eroding canyon makes traversing the narrow pathways zig-zagging the cliff walls difficult at the best of times and almost impossible where the paths have nearly crumbled away. Slipping and sliding as you make your way around, you desperately look for handholds to help you retain your balance.

Room.Name: A Large Cavern
Room.Description: Sculpted by a river long past, the cave was made larger by the claws of the dragons who used it to nest, easily accomodating a she-dragon and her mate. Debris from the carvings lay all about, used to build up the wall that incubates the eggs, then broken down again when the hatchlings make their way to daylight. A shimmering silt covers the ground.

Room.Description: Sculpted by a river long past, the cave was made larger by the claws of the dragons who used it to nest, easily accomodating a she-dragon and her mate. Room.Description: Debris from the eroding canyon makes traversing the narrow pathways zig-zagging the cliff walls difficult at the best of times and almost impossible where the paths have nearly crumbled away. Slipping and sliding as you make your way around, you desperately look for handholds to help you retain your balance.

Room.Name: End of a Large Cavern
Room.Description: Egg shell shards litter the ground, shimmering like the silt covered ground. Upon closer inspection, you realize that the shells and silt are solid gold created from hatchling fire as they dry their wings or try to make a meal of one another before the outer wall is broken down.

Debris from the carvings lay all about, used to build up the wall that incubates the eggs, then broken down again when the hatchlings make their way to daylight. A shimmering silt covers the ground.

Room.Name: A Large Cavern
Room.Description: Sculpted by a river long past, the cave was made larger by the claws of the dragons who used it to nest, easily accomodating a she-dragon and her mate. Debris from the carvings lay all about, used to build up the wall that incubates the eggs, then broken down again when the hatchlings make their way to daylight. A shimmering silt covers the ground.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Debris from the eroding canyon makes traversing the narrow pathways zig-zagging the cliff walls difficult at the best of times and almost impossible where the paths have nearly crumbled away. Slipping and sliding as you make your way around, you desperately look for handholds to help you retain your balance.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Loose stones shift precariously beneath your feet, causing you to struggle to retain your balance. At times, the ledge is so narrow you find yourself crawling on your hands and knees just to avoid falling down the sheer, cliff wall to the rock strewn desert below.

Room.Name: End of a Large Cavern
Room.Description: Egg shell shards litter the ground, shimmering like the silt covered ground. Upon closer inspection, you realize that the shells and silt are solid gold created from hatchling fire as they dry their wings or try to make a meal of one another before the outer wall is broken down.

Room.Name: End of a Large Cavern
Room.Description: Egg shell shards litter the ground, shimmering like the silt covered ground. Upon closer inspection, you realize that the shells and silt are solid gold created from hatchling fire as they dry their wings or try to make a meal of one another before the outer wall is broken down.

Room.Name: Entrance to a Large Cavern
Room.Description: Built up and torn down again over and over by hatchling dragon fire, the cavernous space is large enough to comfortably hold a female dragon ready to lay her eggs. Large boulders, blackened from the fires, are strewn across the pathway, partially blocking the entrance to the cave, which reverbrates with each little sound. With a sense of trepedition, you wonder if the occupants are currently in residence.

Room.Name: A Precarious Path
Room.Description: Debris from the eroding canyon makes traversing the narrow pathways zig-zagging the cliff walls difficult at the best of times and almost impossible where the paths have nearly crumbled away. Slipping and sliding as you make your way around, you desperately look for handholds to help you retain your balance.

Room.Name: Entrance to a Large Cavern
Room.Description: Built up and torn down again over and over by hatchling dragon fire, the cavernous space is large enough to comfortably hold a female dragon ready to lay her eggs. Large boulders, blackened from the fires, are strewn across the pathway, partially blocking the entrance to the cave, which reverbrates with each little sound. With a sense of trepedition, you wonder if the occupants are currently in residence.

Room.Name: A Large Cavern
Room.Description: Sculpted by a river long past, the cave was made larger by the claws of the dragons who used it to nest, easily accomodating a she-dragon and her mate. Debris from the carvings lay all about, used to build up the wall that incubates the eggs, then broken down again when the hatchlings make their way to daylight. A shimmering silt covers the ground.

Room.Name: A Large Cavern
Room.Description: Sculpted by a river long past, the cave was made larger by the claws of the dragons who used it to nest, easily accomodating a she-dragon and her mate. Debris from the carvings lay all about, used to build up the wall that incubates the eggs, then broken down again when the hatchlings make their way to daylight. A shimmering silt covers the ground.

Room.Name: End of a Large Cavern
Room.Description: Egg shell shards litter the ground, shimmering like the silt covered ground. Upon closer inspection, you realize that the shells and silt are solid gold created from hatchling fire as they dry their wings or try to make a meal of one another before the outer wall is broken down.

Room.Name: End of a Large Cavern
Room.Description: Egg shell shards litter the ground, shimmering like the silt covered ground. Upon closer inspection, you realize that the shells and silt are solid gold created from hatchling fire as they dry their wings or try to make a meal of one another before the outer wall is broken down.

NPC.name: male dragon olive gold
NPC.description: At first glance, he appears to be preparing to attack. But as you watch him more closely, you realize he's...singing? With incredulous awe, you watch as he begins to shuffle about as he attempts to lure the female dragons to mate with him.
NPC.longDescription: An olive and gold dragon bellows deafeningly.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying

NPC.name: male dragon turquoise garnet
NPC.description: With stunned amazement, you realize that he's not preparing to attack, but performing a crude, ritualistic mating dance. As you gaze about, you see that the females are ignorning him with a studied lack of indifference.
NPC.longDescription: A turquoise and garnet dragon shuffles menacingly.

NPC.name: male dragon sable silver
NPC.description: He throws back his shiny silver head and roars demandingly for the females to mate with him. Despite the crudeness of his vocalizations, you can sense a sing song quality to them that perfectly matches the ritualistic, shuffling dance he is performing.
NPC.longDescription: A sable and silver dragon rakes the ground with his claws.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying

NPC.name: female dragon ruby emerald
NPC.description: With an feigned air of total indifference, she rolls over and stretches out on the sand, refusing to even look at the male dragons dancing and singing for her attentions.
NPC.longDescription: A ruby and emerald dragon basks languidly in the sand.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying

NPC.name: female dragon sapphire coral
NPC.description: She yawns with practiced indifference, baring glistening rows of razor-sharp teeth, each longer than a human finger. She stretches languidly, causing the male dragons to intesify the urgency of their dance.
NPC.longDescription: A sapphire and coral dragon yawns sleepily, baring her razor-sharp teeth.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: female dragon amethyst jade
NPC.description: With leisurely indifference, she glances at the male dragons trying to entice her into mating with them. She stretches lazily then curls up to take a short nap.
NPC.longDescription: An amethyst and jade dragon stretches lazily.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying

NPC.name: hatchling dragon azure copper
NPC.description: Obviously fascinated with fire, she puffs out a small blast that would easily singe the hair right off your head. She gets a wicked gleam in her eye as she quickly prepares to blow a puff at you...
NPC.longDescription: An azure and copper hatchling dragon beathes a small puff of fire.
NPC.shortDescription: an azure and copper hatchling dragon

NPC.name: hatchling dragon onyx aquamarine
NPC.description: A mischevious glitter in his eyes tells you that he likes nothing better than to get into trouble, big or small. But you have a strong suspicion that the bigger the trouble, the more he enjoys it.
NPC.longDescription: An onyx and aquamarine hatchling dragon looks for mischief.
NPC.shortDescription: an onyx and aquamarine hatchling dragon

NPC.name: hatchling dragon topaz scarlett
NPC.description: Obviously rather bored, this pint sized hatchling can't seem to find anything to hold his attention for very long. With a huge sigh, he pushes an egg shard back and forth with one tiny claw.
NPC.longDescription: A topaz and scarlett hatchling dragon plays with an egg shard.
NPC.shortDescription: a topaz and scarlett hatchling dragon
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying

NPC.name: hatchling dragon obsidian vermilion
NPC.description: With a glare and a snort of fire, he sizes you up as an opponent and seems to find you rather unworthy. But he is obviously in a beligerent mood, so he is willing to take you on anyway.
NPC.longDescription: An obsidian and vermilion hatchling dragon glares about, looking for a fight.
NPC.shortDescription: an obsidian and vermilion hatchling dragon

NPC.name: hatchling dragon ivory apricot
NPC.description: With a tired little yawn, she carefully stretches herself out in a comforable position and prepares to take a nice, long nap. She looks about sleepily, making sure all is well, then tucks her head under her tail and dozes off.
NPC.longDescription: An ivory and apricot hatchling dragon curls up to take a nap.
NPC.shortDescription: an ivory and apricot hatchling dragon

NPC.name: komodo dragon
NPC.description: This six foot long monitor lizard is covered in dark green scales with blue-black stripes crisscrossing its back. It's tongue flicks lazily in and out as it watches for an unsuspecting meal to wander by.
NPC.longDescription: A komodo dragon watches you hungrily.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying

NPC.name: horned lizard
NPC.description: A small lizard blends almost perfectly into the shade of a sentinel cactus as it tries to remain cool. Twin proturbences jut from its head, slightly darker in shade than the rest of the brown scales that covers its body.
NPC.longDescription: A small horned lizard hides in the shade of a cactus.

NPC.name: diamondback rattlesnake
NPC.description: With a venomous shake of its tail, it vehemently warns you to keep your distance or pay the consequences. Golden scales cover its body interspersed with a diamond-like pattern of brilliant scarlett.
NPC.longDescription: A diamondback rattlesnake rattles its tale at you in warning.

NPC.name: black racer
NPC.description: Smaller than most snakes, it easily compensates for its tiny size by the incredible speed with which it moves. Jet black in color, it seems to draw the light into itself to the point that you can't even differentiate where one scale ends and another begins.
NPC.longDescription: A black racer streaks across the sand.

NPC.name: sentinel cactus
NPC.description: Sparsley covered in bright pink flowers, this sentinel cactus stands watch over the Long Sands. Its thorns, as long and thick as human fingers, cast eerie shadows across the pure white expanse. Arm-like extensions reach toward the sky, seeking the warmth of the sun.
NPC.longDescription: A sentinel cactus watches quietly over the Long Sands

NPC.name: tumbleweed
NPC.description: A small tumbleweed rolls lightly across the sands, picking up more objects as it moves along. Tiny crackling sounds can be heard as it moves steadily on its way.
NPC.longDescription: A small tumbleweed rolls slowly across the Long Sands.

Item.Name: barb cactus
Item.ShortDescription: the barb of a sentinel cactus
Item.LongDescription: A wicked looking barb glints with baneful intent.

Item.Name: triple spiked tail
Item.ShortDescription: the triple spiked tail of a turquiose dragon
Item.LongDescription: A dragon's tail, with a trio of spikes, forms a crude belt.

Item.Name: glossy wing
Item.ShortDescription: the glossy wing of a sable and silver dragon
Item.LongDescription: A glossy wing of sable and silver molds itself into a supple cape.

Item.Name: rear claws
Item.ShortDescription: the rear claws of an olive and gold dragon
Item.LongDescription: A deadly pair of olive and gold claws gleam malignantly.

Item.Name: front claws
Item.ShortDescription: the front claws of a ruby and emerald dragon
Item.LongDescription: A pair of emerald and ruby claws sparkle like cut gems.

Item.Name: dragon teeth necklace
Item.ShortDescription: a necklace of sapphire and coral dragon teeth
Item.LongDescription: A jumble of various sized teeth glitter in the dirt.

Item.Name: dragonscale shield
Item.ShortDescription: a shield of amethyst and jade dragonscales
Item.LongDescription: A pile of amethyst and jade scales form a dazzling shield.

Item.Name: ribcage dragonbone
Item.ShortDescription: the ribcage of an azure and copper dragon
Item.LongDescription: A large mound of bones glints dully in the dirt.

Item.Name: skull dragon
Item.ShortDescription: the skull of an onyx and aquamarine dragon
Item.LongDescription: A graceful looking skull is half buried in the ground.

Item.Name: scales suit armor dragonscales
Item.ShortDescription: the scales of a topaz and scarlet dragon
Item.LongDescription: A pile of topaz and scarlett scales glow radiantly.

Item.Name: dragonscale sleeves
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of obsidian and vermilion dragonscale sleeves
Item.LongDescription: A clump of obsidian and vermilian dragonscales shimmer brightly.

Item.Name: dragonscale leggings
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of ivory and apricot dragonscale leggings
Item.LongDescription: A heap of ivory and apricot dragonscales clutters the ground.

Item.Name: ring ivory dragonbone
Item.LongDescription: A crudely carved ring of ivory catches your eye.

Item.Name: bracelet dragon bone sapphire coral dragonbone
Item.ShortDescription: a bracelet carved from sapphire and coral dragonbone
Item.LongDescription: A rustic looking bracelet carved from the bone of a dragon grabs your attention.

Item.Name: eye dragon
Item.ShortDescription: an amethyst and jade dragon's eye
Item.LongDescription: A large eye glitters with amethyst and jade hues.

Item.Name: tail mace olive gold
Item.ShortDescription: a mace fashioned from an olive and gold dragon tail
Item.LongDescription: A wicked looking mace fashioned from the tail of a dragon lays in the dirt.

Item.Name: sabre bone dragon dragonbone
Item.LongDescription: An exquisitely carved saber of dragon bone is stuck in the ground.

Item.Name: sable silver talon blade
Item.ShortDescription: the talon of a sable and silver dragon
Item.LongDescription: A blade carved from a dragons talon gleams from excessive polish.
